text: Naki tara bale ye, ‘se eta udbhabana kareche.’ Baluna, ‘yadi ami eta udbhabana kare thaki, tabe tomara amake allah‌ra sasti theke bamcate kichura'i malika na'o. Tomara ye bisaye alocanaya lipta acha, se sambandhe allaha sabisesa abagata. Amara o tomadera madhye saksi hisebe tini'i yathesta ebam tini ksamasila, parama dayalu.’
